data.actual_result: When you start call, the call ends immediately and appears as a missed call. Does not ring for other participants.
data.expected_result: When you click the call button, the call menu with members of the chat should appear, and should ring them
data.short_description: When you try to call anywhere outside a server (DM, Group Chat) discord ends call immediately and says missed call.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to DMS/Group Chat Second - Start call
